text: Sándor Ádám (February 1, 1892 in Budapest – ?) was a Hungarian water polo player who competed in the 1912 Summer Olympics. He was part of the Hungarian team in the 1912 tournament. ==References== Category:1892 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Hungarian male water polo players Category:Water polo players at the 1912 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic water polo players of Hungary
title: Sándor Ádám
